name: Zoo and Wild Animals Mod: Rebuilt
summary: The Zoo and Wild Animals Mod: Rebuilt Mod was made to improve on the original ZAWA mod by adding better animations, behaviors, models and tons of special features! We are planning on adding a total of 100 new species to minecraft over the course of 3 major releases! We are working towards adding the full variety and wonder of the Earth's wildlife to minecraft, from the smallest tree frogs to the massive humpback whale to the intelligent chimpanzee! Alongside the animals is a variety of blocks, plants, items and weapons to help the player survive in the wild, capture animals, and build the best zoo possible! Explore the Wild, Educate yourself on the Animals, and Engineer the world's coolest Zoo!
